law.catch_line: All real and personal property used or intended for use in the course of, derived from, or realized ...

text.section: All real and personal property used or intended for use in the course of, derived from, or realized through a violation of this subtitle shall be subject to forfeiture to the State.
The Attorney General and the State's Attorney are authorized to commence forfeiture proceedings under this subtitle.
The forfeiture of property under this subtitle shall be subject to Title 13, Subtitle 4 of the Criminal Procedure Article.
